author: Emile Ondrus
title: Itelagen Revolutionizes The Delivery Of Pain Management Care With Paincare™
text:
ITelagen, LLC, a leading provider of healthcare IT support and system administration has developed PainCare™, a series of Pain Management-focused templates geared toward enhancing the use of EHR for Pain Management specialists. ITelagen provides a range of support services and products including professional services, training, hosting and traditional IT support; making it a one-stop shop for electronic health record (EHR) solutions. With content development and workflow guidance provided by Pain Management specialists, ITelagen began marketing and providing demonstrations of PainCare on August 15, 2015. PainCare is now marketed nationwide and empowers Pain Management specialists with integrated technology designed to match Pain Management workflows. PainCare delivers patient-at-a-glance views providing pertinent information with reduced digging and multiple clicks through templates.
PainCare provides efficiency by design through reduced scrolling and a clutter-free workflow that matches that of a Pain Management practice. The delivery of patient-at-a-glance views featuring pre-populated templates, defaulting directly to Pain Management and including common assessment selections makes data entry an easy task. PainCare immediately pulls medical history and pertinent vitals based on previous visits and diagnosis codes.
John O’Keefe, chief executive officer for ITelagen, said: “We are always looking to differentiate ourselves in the market. PainCare’s specialized templates and database of Pain Management information offers Pain Management specialists time- and cost-savings features and functions for their practices. We believe PainCare is a must-have for any Pain Management specialist currently utilizing an EHR solution or thinking about implementing one into his or her practice.” The single-click navigation to Pain Management common assessments, procedures, treatment plans and orders minimizes documentation and improves the accuracy of medical records.
PainCare is designed to enhance the clinical, business and financial performance of all size practices. The product provides key application features and functions Pain Management specialists need to be successful and compatible with their EHR. Offering practices cost flexibility, PainCare can be implemented as a combined solution or as a stand-alone application. Regardless, PainCare is provided by ITelagen as part of a total solution for Pain Management practices which includes implementation, maintenance, hosting and support for one low monthly fee. The ITelagen approach makes PainCare affordable for many practices, regardless of size.
ITelagen adds PainCare as a product offering among a wide array of other ancillary services including implementation, training, support, template development, hosting and system optimization. ITelagen provides unlimited onsite and remote technical support for businesses, and the platform monitors the activity of servers 24/7 to ensure the security of client applications. Its cloud-based system supports and manages patients’ EHRs, as well as assists with coding and billing records, medical and insurance claims, and categorizing insurance collections. ITelagen also provides disaster recovery, and related services to update and back up data.
